prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a serpentine body covered in dark and gold accents.
Show me a dragon Pokemon with multiple shadowy arms and a striking color combination.
Imagine a mythical Pokemon resembling a serpent that dominates the skies and shadows.
Design a legendary Pokemon with a blend of black, white, and gold colors, exuding power.
Give me a ghost-dragon hybrid Pokemon featuring an intricate design and vibrant color palette.
Generate a unique creature with a fearsome appearance, showcasing dark tones and red claws.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of shadows and nightmares, with a majestic form.
